text:
Day 48.
For 48 days, I have posted about toxic and dangerous #PFAS and #PFOS chemicals in UK waters.
Hoping for voices to amplify and investigate.

Nothing so far.

'I told you so' is not what I want.

 @EnvAgency @DefraWater @GeorgeMonbiot @carolecadwalla @BBCNews @Channel4News
